CustomField.description: Disable trigger that enables IsChangedIBANBIC__c on SBQQ__Quote__c when IBAN or BIC is updated by client when signing quote from DocuSign
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Disable trigger that enables IsChangedIBANBIC__c on SBQQ__Quote__c when IBAN or BIC is updated by client when signing quote from DocuSign
CustomField.label: Flag Bank Info Changed
